description: [106 Messiers down, 4 more to go](i.imgur.com/hxBr7J8.png). I've also made an [annotated version of this image highlighting all the faint galaxies in the background.](i.imgur.com/jdQzJ2Z.jpg) Captured over 5 nights in March/April, 2020 from a bortle 7 zone. --- **[Equipment:](i.imgur.com/BYyK1wu.jpg)** * TPO 6" F/4 Imaging Newtonian * Orion Sirius EQ-G * ZWO ASI1600MM-Pro * Skywatcher Quattro Coma Corrector * ZWO EFW 8x1.25"/31mm * Astronomik LRGB+CLS Filters- 31mm * Astrodon 31mm Ha 5nm, Oiii 3nm * Agena 50mm Deluxe Straight-Through Guide Scope * ZWO ASI-120MC for guiding * Moonlite Autofocuser **Acquisition:** 14 hours 18 minutes (Camera at Unity Gain, -20Â°C) * CLS- 308x120" * Red- 81x60"" * Green- 80x60" * Blue- 81x60" * Darks- 30 * Flats- 30 per filter **Capture Software:** * EQMod mount control. Captured using [N.I.N.A.](nighttime-imaging.eu/) and PHD2 for guiding and dithering. **PixInsight Processing:** * [Blink](youtu.be/sJeuWZNWImE?t=40) * BatchPreProcessing * StarAlignment * ImageIntegration * DrizzleIntrgration (2X, VarK 1.5) * DynamicCrop * DynamicBackgroundExtraction 2X **CLS:** * Deconvolution * TGV/MMT noise reduction * ArcsinhStretch * HistogramTransformation * ACDNR **RGB:** * StarAlignment to drizzled CLS stack * LinearFit to green * ChannelCombination * AutomaticBackgroundExtraction * PhotometricColorCalibration * HSV Repair * ArcsinhStretch * HistogramTransformation * LRGBCombination with CLS * ACDNR * LocalHistogramEqualization * [Curve](i.imgur.com/1gNBR6K.jpg)Transformations for lightness and saturation (with range masks) * SCNR * MorphologicalTransformation to reduce star sizes * Annotation
title: M88 and M91
